name: olio.llm.contextResult
description: Ephemeral response DTO for attach/detach context operations.

fields.name: attached
fields.description: True when an attach operation succeeded.

fields.name: detached
fields.description: True when a detach operation succeeded.

fields.name: attachType
fields.description: The type of attachment (chatConfig, promptConfig, systemCharacter, userCharacter, context, tag).

fields.name: summarizing
fields.description: True when an auto-summarize was kicked off for the attached object.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Error message if the operation failed.
